subtab.title: TCI Custom Checkout Messaging
subtab.description: Configuration of the TCI Custom Checkout Messaging that will display during checkout

checkoutApp.fileUploadFolderId.title: FILE UPLOAD FOLDER ID
checkoutApp.fileUploadFolderId.description: Input Folder id for uploading file

checkoutMessaging.tooltip.title: TCI Custom Checkout Messaging for Tooltip
checkoutMessaging.tooltip.description: Input text that you wish to display when hovering over tooltip in checkout review page
checkoutMessaging.tooltip.default: Enter only one email. Subscription access information will be sent to this email. If left blank, it will be sent to the purchaser email.

checkoutMessaging.confirmation.title: TCI Custom Checkout Messaging for Tooltip
checkoutMessaging.confirmation.description: Input text that you wish to display when hovering over tooltip in checkout review page
checkoutMessaging.confirmation.default:
!!!What Happens Next

You'll receive 2-3 important emails from us...depending on what you ordered. CHECK YOUR SPAM FOLDER if an email is missing.

  • Email #1: Order Confirmation

  • Email #2: Subscription Instructions
  • If you ordered a subscription, we'll send you instructions to get your subscriptions up and running.
  • This email is sent 1 business day after you place your order.
    Check your SPAM FOLDER for this email.

  • Email #3: Shipping Confirmation
  • If you ordered print materials, we'll send you a tracking number when your order is shipped.
  • This email is sent 1-3 business days after you place your order.

Questions? Email us at info@teachtci.com.

checkoutMessaging.subscriptionEmailLabel.title: Subscription Email Label
checkoutMessaging.subscriptionEmailLabel.description: Input label that you wish to display for the subscription email

checkoutMessaging.schoolclosureLable.title: School Closure or Delivery Date
checkoutMessaging.schoolclosureLable.description: Input label that you wish to display for the School Closure or Delivery Date

checkoutMessaging.schoolclosuretooltip.title: TCI Custom Checkout Messaging for School clouser Tooltip
checkoutMessaging.schoolclosuretooltip.description: Input text that you wish to display when hovering over school closure tooltip in checkout review page
checkoutMessaging.schoolclosuretooltip.default: Provide school closure or add desired delivery date. Delivery date cannot be less than 15 days from the order date. TCI cannot guarantee delivery date during the month of August.

checkoutMessaging.defalutShippingmethod.title: Defalut Shipmethod
checkoutMessaging.defalutShippingmethod.description: This shipmethod will set as default When cart  does not contains service item

checkoutMessaging.defalutShippingmethodf.title: Shipmethod For Sevice Items
checkoutMessaging.defalutShippingmethodf.description: This shipmethod will set as default When cart contains atleast one service item
